Track Layout

The Midlands' Best Karting Track

Experience the exhilarating rush of driving on the Midlands’ best karting circuit! The track has been completely overhauled and we now have a New Multi Level Circuit with super smooth ramps for a seamless transition between levels. We've kept it fast, flowing, and even thrown in a few little technical bits to test the skills of even the best drivers. Competition for the outright fastest lap will be fierce.

Adults get to drive our powerful 200cc Sodi SR4 karts for high-octane thrills and competition. For the younger drivers, our new Junior Racer karts are the perfect choice to hone their skills before progressing up to the adult category.

Our on-site kitchen provides food and drinks throughout the day, and our corporate lounge overlooking the track is perfect for parties looking for a VIP experience.

Think you’ve got what it takes to be the best? Have a go at our fastest lap and claim the top of the leaderboard for yourself!

About Us

Fastlane Karting is located in Fenton, Stoke on Trent, Staffordshire and within easy driving distance of Shropshire, Cheshire and Derbyshire in the East Midlands. We operate Sodi karts for corporate, group parties and arrive & drive sessions. We also have Cadet karts for juniors.

Address

  • 151 King Street
  • Stoke On Trent
  • Staffordshire
